issue_title: [Test] test_issue_2000_json_validation.py:26 的正则不匹配实际错误消息

triage.root_cause: Test regex r"invalid json|malformed|parse error" is case-sensitive and cannot match actual error message "Invalid JSON". Test passed only due to false positive from filename 'malformed.json' matching the 'malformed' pattern.
risk_points: Test reliability issue - passes accidentally due to filename coincidence
Case sensitivity mismatch between regex and actual error message
verification_targets: Regex fails to match 'Invalid JSON' without (?i) flag
Test passes with 'db.json' filename only when using case-insensitive regex

fix.approach: Made regex case-insensitive using (?i) prefix and changed filename to 'db.json' to eliminate false positive
